articles.author: Samantha Kelly, CNN Business
articles.title: Here's how much vaccines are selling for on the illegal market - CNN
articles.description: Counterfeit vaccine cards and what are being billed as Covid-19 vaccines are now for sale on the dark web, according to a report released Tuesday.
